DOC.brief_summary: Cognitive profile of patients who suffer both from PTSD and OCD, as compared to those who suffer from PTSD or OCD without other comorbidity.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Characteristics of PTSD Patients With OCD
DOC.detailed_description: Demographic data and cognitive data will be compared on PTSD, PTSD-OCD and OCD patients using a battery of computerized cognitive tests
DOC.criteria: Patients suffer from current PTSD with no other comorbidity Patients suffer from current OCD with no other comorbidity Patients suffer from current PTSD and OCD Patients suffer from PTSD and OC symptoms
